channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Newsmax pays $67 million to settle defamation case linked to 2020 election coverage
item.description: The right-wing news channel Newsmax has agreed to pay $67 million to Dominion Voting Systems over its coverage of the 2020 presidential election. A tr...

item.title: Texas Democrats Set to End Walkout Over Redistricting, Allowing Redrawn Map to Pass
item.description: Democratic lawmakers returned to Texas after fleeing the state for two weeks. Republicans are ready to quickly pass a new congressional map called for...

item.title: Marco Rubio Once Filed a Brief Embracing Birthright Citizenship
item.description: Rubio, a son of immigrants and now secretary of state, was responding to a 2016 lawsuit questioning his eligibility for the presidency.

item.title: Myanmar to hold first general election since 2021 coup amid ongoing civil war
item.description: With large parts of the country under opposition control amid an ongoing civil war, analysts warn that election logistics could prove challenging.

item.title: Researchers discover a secret weapon that saves babies' lives. And it's not medical

item.title: A Risky Bet: Louisville’s Democratic Mayor Accommodates ICE
item.description: Craig Greenberg’s move, requested by the Trump administration, allows federal agents more time to detain immigrants who are held at the city’s jail.

item.title: Air Canada Flight Attendant Strike Declared Illegal by Labor Board
item.description: The Canada Industrial Relations Board ordered the flight attendants’ union to call off the job action by midday.

item.title: Trump and Zelenskyy to discuss end of war. And, more troops head to D.C.

item.title: Two Police Officers Are Shot and Killed at House in Utah
item.description: The officers were responding to a domestic disturbance on Sunday when a man came outside and opened fire, the police said.
